comments.value: # Functionality : As a tester, I want to complete a funds transfer transaction so that I can pass on funds to another cardholder.

elements.name: Open Getgo mobile application
As a tester, I want to complete a funds transfer transaction from my virtual card account so that I can pass on funds to another cardholder (Add recipient from saved list).

steps.name: I'm on Getgo Fund transfer page of my "Virtual" card account
I Enter card number, recipient name, amount, system date, frequency, and message - Add recipient from saved list by clicking on add button
I review transfer instruction and click submit
I should see the confirmation page

elements.name: Open Getgo mobile application
As a tester, I want to complete a funds transfer transaction from my virtual card account so that I can pass on funds to another cardholder.

steps.name: I'm on Getgo Fund transfer page of my "Virtual" card account
I Enter card number, recipient name, amount, system date, frequency, and message
I review transfer instruction and click submit
I should see the confirmation page

name: Card transfer Feature Using Virtual Account

comments.value: # Functionality : As a tester, I want to be able to complete a currency conversion transaction so that I can transact in another currency.

elements.name: Login into account
As a tester, I want to be able to complete a currency conversion transaction so that I can transact in another currency.

steps.name: I'm on Currency conversion screen after noting down the balance of "AUD" currency
Conversion amount will be automatically populated under To Amount field

result.error_message:
exceptions.ApplicationException: Actual value [John BerlinFuertes **** 5506] not matching with the Expected value[John Berlin Fuertes]
	at actions.Verify.elementTextContains(Verify.java:46)
	at pages.PageCurrencyConversionReview.transferFrom(PageCurrencyConversionReview.java:15)
	at stepdefinitions.Getgo_CurrencyConversion.iReviewConversionDetailsAndSubmit(Getgo_CurrencyConversion.java:52)
	at ✽.When I review conversion details and submit(Getgo_CurrencyConversion.feature:23)

steps.name: I review conversion details and submit
Amount should be converted & displayed in the dashboard

comments.value: # Functionality : As a tester, I want to be able to login using my credentials so that I can see my card details.

elements.name: Open Getgo mobile application
As a tester, I want to be able to login using my credentials so that I can see my account(Virtual Card or Peso+) details

steps.name: I should see my "Virtual" account dashboard with my profile picture & my full name

elements.name: Open Getgo mobile application
As a tester, I want to be able to login using my credentials so that I can see my account(Virtual Card or Peso+) details

steps.name: I should see my "Peso" account dashboard with my profile picture & my full name

comments.value: # Functionality : As a tester, I want to complete a funds transfer transaction so that I can pass on funds to another cardholder.

elements.name: Open Getgo mobile application
As a tester, I want to add new recipients and tag some of them as favorites so that I can keep a list of recipients (From Card transfer page)

steps.name: I'm on Getgo Fund transfer page
Add a recipient and tag it as a favorite
I Choose Manage Recipients option again
Recipient should be displayed in my favourites

elements.name: Open Getgo mobile application
As a tester, I want to add new recipients and tag some of them as favorites so that I can keep a list of recipients (From Beneficiaries page)

steps.name: I add a recipient and tag it as a favorite
Recipient should be displayed in my favourites

comments.value: # Functionality : Validate the fields & texts displayed on the Getgo application screens

elements.name: Open Getgo mobile application
Validate the fields & texts displayed on the Getgo Welcome & SignUp page

steps.name: I should see two buttons "LOG IN" "SIGN UP", Getgo logo, a caption "Now made easier. As simple as Ready, GetGo."

arguments.val: Now made easier. As simple as Ready, GetGo.

steps.name: I should see two button "Yes" "No", Getgo card image, two messages "Do you have a GetGo Peso Plus Card?" & "Start shopping online by creating your GetGo Virtual Prepaid Card. Or register your Peso + Prepaid Card now."

arguments.val: Do you have a GetGo Peso Plus Card?
Start shopping online by creating your GetGo Virtual Prepaid Card. Or register your Peso + Prepaid Card now.

elements.name: Open Getgo mobile application
Validate the fields & texts displayed on the Getgo Login page

steps.name: I should see back arrow, page title as "Login", a caption "Enter your registered email address", a text box with inner text "Email address", a link "Forgot your password?", a "NEXT" button & a sign up link "Don’t have an account? SIGN UP NOW!"

arguments.val: Don’t have an account? SIGN UP NOW!

steps.name: I should see back arrow, page title as "Login", a caption "Enter your password", a text box with inner text "Password", a link "Having problems with your account?", a "LOGIN" button & a password visibility toggle button
